A new game at cards, or, The three nimble shuffling cheaters to a pleasant new tune, Or, what you please.
1 sheet ([2] p.) : ill. (woodcuts)
For Francis Coles, John Wright, Tho. Vere and William Gilbertson, [London : 1655-1658]
Item lacks imprint. Publication data suggested by Wing (2nd ed.). Verses in black letter, chorus lines in Roman. Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
